sentence.Network_en: An entrepreneur is more than just a risk taker. He is a visionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 企业家不仅要能承担风险，还应富于远见。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (denoting the director of a musical institution): from French, from entreprendre 'undertake' (see enterprise)

entry.def: An entrepreneur is a person who sets up businesses and business deals.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who organizes a business venture and assumes the risk for it

con全部+noiss=know知道+eur……人→n.鉴赏家,行家
entrepren=enterprise企业,事业+eur……人→n.[法]企业家,主办人
pose摆姿势+eur……人→poseur装模作样的人
racont=recount叙述+eur……人→n.善于讲故事的人
